section.title: Employee Override
section.para:
The system will allow for the ability to override the Accrual Category limits, such as usage, carryover, transfer or payout, for an individual employee. The system will check to see if the employee has an exception every time the logic is executed for
Max Balance
Max Transfer Amount
Max Payout Amount
Max Usage
Max Annual Carryover
Max Balance

row.entry: Date the override will go into effect.
Leave Plan associated with the Principal ID and Accrual Category.
Text field used to identify the Accrual Category the override will be applied too.
Accrual Category limit that should be used for the Employee.
The new limit value to be used for the Accrual Category.
Text field used to describe the reason for the override.

note.para: Access will be restricted to System Admins.

section.title: Leave Adjustment
section.para: Ability to modify a employeeâ€™s earn code accrual balance. Restricted to System Admins or Department Admins with options to either create new or view existing donation records. On submit a leave block will be generated and displayed on their leave calendar.

row.entry: Date the adjustment will go into effect.

Earn Code associated with the Accrual Category and leave adjustment.
The value of the leave adjustment, positive or negative

note.para: An employee will not have ability to modify their own leave balances.

section.title: Leave Donation
section.para: Employee's may donate leave to another employee. The donation transaction is done by the system admin with option to create new or view existing donation records. On submit leave blocks are generated for both recipient and donor that will display on their leave calendar. Leave donation may or may not be prorated according to the donor and recipient's salary. Amount Donated and Amount Received must be manually entered and is what will be removed/added from the designated Accrual Categories.
